body.name: Gizoon Farmhouse Buffet Cabinet, Kitchen Storage Cabinet with Adjustable Shelves, 3 Drawers and 2 Doors, Sideboard Buffet Cabinet for Dining Room, Living Room, Grey
body.stockDetail: Only 8 left in stock - order soon.
features: 【Large & Flexible Storage Space】The coffee bar cabinet cabinet can meet various storage needs with both open and enclosed space. Two large open compartments, 3 drawers and 2 large side cabinets with an adjustable shelf to accommodate items in different sizes.

【Premium Material & Solid Structure】Made of high-quality MDF wood and robust metal handle, the farmhouse buffet cabinet with storage with drawers boasts superior durability and stability to withstand years of time, and the table surface can support up to 250 lbs.

【Unique Farmhouse Design】The farmhouse coffee bar seamlessly combines functionality, aesthetics, and space utilization. This buffet storage sideboard becomes a focal point in your living room or dining area, which complements easily with most existing decor themes.

【Multi-functional Cabinet】This farmhouse sideboard buffet cabinet can transform into a dining room sideboard, kitchen or hallway storage cabinet, and can even be used as a TV stand in the living room or bedroom.

【Easy Assembly】The bar cabinet includes exquisite hardware and a detailed manual with intuitive illustrations and instructions. The kitchen cabinet will be in a very secure box that contains foam and protective boards surrounding it.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Details Elegant Door Handles Elegant round door handle, which not only decorates your house but also facilitates the opening and closing of cabinet doors. Magnetic Door The magnetic attraction hidden in the door helps you open and close the door more conveniently and reduces the noise when opening/closing the door. High Quality Rails With high-quality drawer slides, it is easier to pull out the drawer and has a longer lifespan that will last for many years. Round Corner Design The friendly corners use a round design to protect you and your family from being hurt by sharp corners.

Previous page 3 Large Drawers The 3 drawers allow you to store your daily necessities in an orderly manner and within easy reach. Adjustable Divider The adjustable partition can meet the storage needs of different heights and use the space flexibly. Next page 1 Large Space 2 Multifunctional Cabinet

use in various rooms Living room display cabinet This 3 drawer two-door storage cabinet is a very practical piece of furniture, ideal for use in the living room. Its style matches a variety of living room styles. The overall design is simple and elegant, and the platform above the cabinet can be used to place some decorations or electrical appliances such as TV sets, which is more practical. Three drawers can store some daily necessities, such as magazines, remote controls, etc., while two cabinet doors can store some infrequently used items.

use in various rooms Entryway console cabinet The overall design of this cabinet is simple and elegant, the size is moderate, and it will not take up too much space. It is placed at the entrance, and you can place your favorite decorative paintings or small items such as keys on the countertop, which is very practical. Drawers and cabinets can store different items in different categories, neat and orderly. Practical and beautiful furniture adds a lot of convenience to our entrance.

use in various rooms Bedroom storage cabinet This storage cabinet is definitely a minimalist but functional piece of furniture. It's a good size, doesn't take up too much space, but is big enough to hold our usual items. The inside of the cabinet is divided into multiple compartments, which allow us to store different types of items in a neat and orderly manner, which can add a lot of convenience and comfort to our bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to out together!
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to give this product a 4.5 only because 1 set of screws were missing and it was damaged a bit. I reached out to the seller and was sent the missing hardware ( it's took about a week and a half to receive). The only other complaint was that I was told the damage would not affect function. I think I should have been the one to decide that but they did give me a small credit! Other than those issues, the product was easy to put together. The instructions were clear and concise with pictures and words. The parts were labled and each step gave a list of parts you needed. The quality was great and it will be a great addition to my kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Well, this was a labor of love as it took me about 5 hours to assemble on my own. The instructions for the drawer tracks were not easy to read and went on backwards. Which I only realized at the end when I had to put the drawers in and had to redo them. Yet it looks nice, seems sturdy, so hopefully it holds up the test of time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The buffet is awesome, looks very nice, great amount of storage, easy to assemble. We love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice piece of furniture. It holds a lot and looks great. Easy to install and comes with high quality tools and materials. Very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made
reviews.reviewText: I bought one in October and we ended up getting a second in January. They are very well made and perfect. Takes some time putting it together but worth it for the price. Very well packaged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than I expected
reviews.reviewText: It’s very beautiful and sturdy but smaller than I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing buffet table
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and looks amazing in my dining room . Drawers are a little weird they stick out a tad so aren’t flush to the buffet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size was perfect
